t: Amazon and Energy Dept. team up to change how we recycle plastic - Amazon Science

t: Exposed: Amazon's enormous and rapidly growing plastic pollution problem | Oceana
s: July 20, 2023 - Exposed: Amazon’s enormous and rapidly growing plastic pollution problem · Oceana analyzed e-commerce packaging data and found that Amazon generated 599 million pounds of plastic packaging waste in 2020. This is a 29% increase of Oceana’s 2019 estimate of 465 million pounds.

t: Amazon announces its largest reduction in plastic packaging in North America to date
s: June 20, 2024 - Amazon has replaced 95% of the plastic air pillows from delivery packaging in North America with paper filler, working toward full removal by the end of the year.
